/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a high vantage point, providing a bird's eye view of the cityscape. The street, lined with towering buildings and lush greenery, stretches out into the distance, creating a sense of depth and scale. The sky above is a clear blue, dotted with wispy clouds, adding a serene backdrop to the urban landscape. The sun shines brightly, casting a warm glow over the scene and highlighting the architectural details of the buildings. The image is taken from a low angle, which emphasizes the height of the buildings and gives the viewer a sense of being in the midst of the city's hustle and bustle.
